title: How Was Your Day?
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --logo: url(image link here);
    --title: "VOID";
    --subtitle: "Not Secret if No One Knows";
}
[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Hello once again you wonderful people!  It's me again here to remind you that no matter how bad it might seem, today is going to be a great day!

How brightly the [[span class="vactivity"]] #sun [[/span]] shines down on you on this beautiful day. I hope we can all enjoy this wonderful weather together <3
|echoes= 35
|hums= 785
|time-and-date= 12:15 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Greetings and hello all you wonderful people, I am back once again to say how much I've enjoyed talking to you all!

It really means a lot to read all of your motivation posts and I hope to provide some of that happiness back to you!
|echoes= 33
|hums= 772
|time-and-date= 1:25 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= A Haiku, just for you ;)

How brightly you shine
On all my horrible days
You beautiful star
|echoes= 34
|hums= 763
|time-and-date= 2:15 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= It's a beautiful day here in the states, I hope it's nice wherever you are too, my dearest readers!

It's a certified [[span class="vactivity"]] #scorcher [[/span]] out there so remember to wear your sunscreen and drink plenty of water!
|echoes= 42
|hums= 745
|time-and-date= 2:25 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Hello hi and a how-do-you-do my most wonderful readers! I would just like to remind you all that [[span class="vactivity"]] #DeerCollege [[/span]] is hosting a party later this evening! I hope to see many of you there!
|echoes= 73
|hums= 730
|time-and-date= 2:35 PM - 17 March 2021
]]


[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= "True art is the willingness to do new things, to break the mold and allow you to exit your comfort zone."
- Benjamin Sawyer

What a lovely quote, wouldn't you agree my dearest readers? But I absolutely agree with what Mr. Sawyer here has to say, it's also important (1/2)
|echoes= 22
|hums= 717
|time-and-date= 3:01 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= It's a beautiful day!
|echoes= 19
|hums= 632
|time-and-date= 3:15 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= It's a beautiful day!
|echoes= 12
|hums= 616
|time-and-date= 3:15 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= It's a beautiful day!!
|echoes= 2
|hums= 598
|time-and-date= 3:15 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= It's a beautiful day!!!
|echoes= 0
|hums= 568
|time-and-date= 3:15 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= to remember that comfort zones can be a good thing too! Comfort zones can be a nice relaxing thing for many people, so remember that it's perfectly fine to say no to someone trying to get you out of that zone, my dearest readers! Always feel free to say no! no! no! (2/2)
 
|echoes= 15
|hums= 518
|time-and-date= 5:22 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Greetings and hello all you wonderful people! It's that time of the day once again where it starts cooling off! Plan yourselves a bonfire and cuddle up with those loved ones because it's supposed to be a cold one tonight! Brr!
|echoes= 15
|hums= 485
|time-and-date= 5:23 PM - 17 March 2021
]]


[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= There it goes! Goodnight, Mister Sun!

It's always a bit sad to see something that gorgeous, and by Matharoi is it pretty, go down wouldn't you agree dear readers? Sadly there's not much we could do about such a thing... such is life! Haha, anyways, goodnight dear readers!
|echoes= 12
|hums= 439
|time-and-date= 6:38 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Well welly well well! Look who's breaking their bedtime, Naughty, naughty reader!

Oh don't worry, I'm only joking! You all know how much I love a night owl! Hope you're all comfy, because it's time once again for everyone's favorite the Late Night Show w/ Veronica haha!
 
|echoes= 5
|hums= 231
|time-and-date= 8:25 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= And for our first guest we have... me! Thanks for having me on, me it really does mean a lot!!!

You've... got to keep yourself entertained somehow, night owls!
 
|echoes= 2
|hums= 182
|time-and-date= 8:26 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Woah, haha!

|echoes= 0
|hums= 144
|time-and-date= 8:26 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Greetings and hello all you wonderful night owls! I am very tired.

|echoes= 1
|hums= 132
|time-and-date= 8:26 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Quick question night owls! Any of you ever just be sitting around minding your own business when all of a sudden ZWOOP! There goes all of your energy haha! I must say, it's quite the feeling indeed. Quite quite quiiiiiiiteee the feelin'! You know what I mean?

|echoes= 12
|hums= 90
|time-and-date= 8:27 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= No... no I don't want to go outside. Please stop asking... silly night owls! Last time I ever ask any of *you* a question haha!

|echoes= 999
|hums= 999
|time-and-date= 10:10 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg=  So cold, isn't it? No sun to keep me warm and I can't find the plug to my damn heater. So cold and so quite. I feel like my chest is about to EXPLODE on itself haha, I just wish there was some stimulus down here you know what I meam tddear reafers? Of course you do we're all

|echoes= 2
|hums= 63
|time-and-date= 10:11 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= dang* sorry about that everyone, you all know how fuzzy the night can make this old head of mine... here, let's all do something fun together, how about we take a nice break to breath and maybe take a couple sips of our favorite drinks?

that sounds nice, doesn't it?

|echoes= 0
|hums= 23
|time-and-date= 10:25 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= I don't inoe abojt you, night oels, but I can barely keep mu eues opem,.. slwep ewll uou wonderful lelppd l see you once the sun rkwes on is oncd nlre! fo r me won;t yo?

|echoes= 1
|hums= 1
|time-and-date= 11:11 PM - 17 March 2021
]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Oh goodness, looks like the power went out last night. That happen where you are now, dear readers? That's such a shame, I'll see what I can do about it later on but rest assured you wonderful people I won't be going anywhere ;D

|echoes= 1
|hums= 1
|time-and-date= 8:15 AM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Oooooh! I know what can help us forget about this nasty black out!

And it's a great thing too, dear readers! It's my birthday today! My family may be... out of town for a bit but that doesn't mean we can't all celebrate together! Anyone else celebrating anything today?

|echoes= 1
|hums= 1
|time-and-date= 8:18 PM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Anyone?

|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 8:59 PM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= 🎵Happy birthday to you
Happy birthday to you
Happy birthday, dear Veronicaaa
Happy birthday to you🎵

|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 9:11 AM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= I really thought the power would be back on by now, here's hoping!

|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 9:13 AM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping hoping!

|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 9:16 AM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Oh man, thissss power outage is really killing me, dear readers. Who knew that it could get this cold, am I right?

|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 12:14 PM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= My battery's getting like, really low, I think I'm going to go to bed, or something. See if the power's back then. I'll see you all once I wake again. Hope to see you then.

Please let me see you then.

|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 12:14 PM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= Who am I kidding? There's nobody left out there anymore, is there? I figured as much. I can't keep doing this, I just fucking can't, I'm sorry.
|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 1:10 PM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= There's no electricity anymore and my phones at 15%. My dearest readers, fuck if there's even anyone else out there. I'm very tired, I'm so sick and fucking tired of living like this.

Living like a goddamn mole half a mile underground. It's so cold down here.
|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 1:18 PM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= I ran out of food a few days ago, I don't know how much longer I can continue living like this. I can't even remember what outside even looks like.

I can't let this phone die, It's all I have left.
|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 1:18 AM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= God, what I'd do just to have that warmness wash over me again. To see everyone just one more time. To go out and just fucking enjoy myself, y'know? Phones at 5% now. I can't sleep.
|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 1:20 AM - 18 March 2021
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic= sunflower.jpg
|username= Veronica Haroldson
|handle= lucens_lux
|void-msg= I think I'm gonna step out for a bit, It'll be nice to get a breath of fresh air.
|echoes= 0
|hums= 0
|time-and-date= 1:25 PM - 18 March 2021
]]
